io.netty.channel.socket.nio

Class NioChannelOption<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.util.AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<T>>
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOption<T>
        • io.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioChannelOption<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constant<ChannelOption<T>>, Comparable<ChannelOption<T>>

    public final class NioChannelOption<T>
extends ChannelOption<T>
    Provides ChannelOption over a given SocketOption which is then passed through the underlying NetworkChannel.
